system.description: Weirdboy gains Astrotelepathy Psychic Technique, but can only send messages up to one word per point of Willpower Bonus. Character (and optionally, player) must shout this message as loud as possible whilst making Focus Power Test.
system.benefit: You gain the Astrotelepathy Psychic Technique, but can only send messages up to one word per point of Willpower Bonus. You (and optionally, your player) must shout this message as loud as possible whilst making the Focus Power Test.

prerequisites.text: Ork Weirdboy, The Power of Da Waaagh, Psy Rating 2, Willpower 35

specialAbilities.name: Ork Astrotelepathy
specialAbilities.description: You gain the Astrotelepathy Psychic Technique, allowing you to send telepathic messages across vast distances. However, messages are limited to one word per point of Willpower Bonus, and you must shout the message as loud as possible while making the Focus Power Test.
